name: Deep Dog
description:
Hi all! This is my submission for Ludum Dare 48. This was not my original idea, that one failed. So I ended up making this game, in less than 12 hours total.

If the game doesn't run on Chrome, try Edge or a different browser.

Your ladyfriend dog fell down a hole... Go to the depths to save her! (You cannot actually reach her in the game).

All assets are on Github. LINK

I will make a devlog about it on my  Youtube channel. Enjoy the game :D

CONTROLS

Mouse Move left and right EShopSTurn on/off sound (when playing)
